## ChromeNavLinks.showOnly() method

Remove all navlinks except the one matching the given id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
showOnly(id: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

NOTE: this is not reversible.
